subject: Re: [junit] Do we need to convince management of the benefits of unit       tests?
msgSnippet: ... I don t like SourceSafe at all, but in my experience, it s that little bit better than no version control at all that it might make sense using it if there
messageBody:
J. B. Rainsberger schrieb:

> I am not a Microsoft basher any more, but I still believe that
> SourceSafe is actually /worse/ than no version control. I feel similarly
> about ClearCase, although not as strongly.

I don't like SourceSafe at all, but in my experience, it's that little
bit better than no version control at all that it might make sense using
it if there are no other options.

Cheers, Ilja
